hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #spider behind webs# in a grotto holds #a Goron Tunic#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #a Huge Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Epona's Song#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Switch Chest
